thread.title: Linda A.
thread.title_full: Sunday Afternoons reviewed by Linda A.

author: Linda A.
title: Linda A.
text: Have purchased hats two times. First time as a gift for my husband. The Impulse Cap fits him great. It's ventilated, which is a plus on hot days, and protects from the sun. After working outside all day, it gets quite sweaty. A quick wash in the sink, hang to dry and it is ready the next morning. The second purchase was a Snow Tripper cap for each of us. This hat fits great, I love the color of mine, Winter Berry, and the pull down flaps fit snug on my ears keeping them toasty on a cold winter day. We also love that we can fold them and tuck them into a coat pocket.
